articles.description: Build-up to the 2024-25 Premier League season which gets underway between Manchester United and Fulham at Old Trafford on Friday, with manager news conferences plus latest transfer news.
articles.title: Football latest: Build-up as the 2024-25 Premier League season gets underway

articles.description: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer on what could make the difference in the Premier League title race, and why the top-four battle will be so fierce.
articles.title: Premier League: 'One signing could give Arsenal the title' - Alan Shearer

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says they are still looking to strengthen the squad after failing to sign Martin Zubimendi.
articles.title: Arne Slot says Liverpool still trying to strengthen after failing to sign Martin Zubimendi

articles.description: The Premier League begins this weekend, with Manchester City bidding to continue their supremacy in English football and Ipswich Town making their top-flight return.
articles.title: Premier League 2024-25: What is new in top flight and what to expect this season

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on The Courteeners frontman Liam Fray to make his predictions for the opening round of Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League opening-weekend predictions: Chris Sutton faces The Courteeners frontman Liam Fray

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Ajax vs Panathinaikos in the UEFA Europa League
articles.title: Ajax vs Panathinaikos: UEFA Europa League - BBC Sport

articles.description: British cyclist Pfeiffer Georgi suffers neck fractures and a broken hand after crashing on stage five of the Tour de France Femmes.
articles.title: Tour de France Femmes 2024: Pfeiffer Georgi fractured neck and broke hand in stage five crash

articles.description: As Dricus du Plessis and Israel Adesanya contest the first all-African UFC title fight, what will be the impact of their bout?
articles.title: UFC 305: Dricus du Plessis and Israel Adesanya meet in 'battle for Africa'

articles.description: A petition calling for breakdancer Raygun to apologise contains 'falsehoods aimed at inciting hatred against her', says the Australian Olympic Committee.
articles.title: Raygun: Petition calling for Australian breakdancer to apologise criticised by Australian Olympic Committee

articles.description: Laura Woods reveales she received "numerous death threats" after commenting on an article about the eligibility of Olympic champion boxers Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting.
articles.title: Laura Woods receives "numerous death threats" over online comment on Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting article
